# getBlock() function

Get a specific block from a given network.

## Example

```javascript
const block = await getBlock({
  network: "ethereum",
  block: 12345678,
});
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getBlock(params: GetBlockParams): Promise<Block>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                      | Description |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| params    | [GetBlockParams](./sdk.getblockparams.md) |             |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Block&gt;

the block for the given block number / block tag
